# init(audioTracks:audioSettings:)

**Initializer**

Creates an object that reads mixed audio from the specified audio tracks.

## Declaration

```swift
init(audioTracks: [AVAssetTrack], audioSettings: [String : Any]?)
```

## Parameters

- **audioTracks**: An array of track objects of type [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaType/audio] from which to source the sample buffers to mix.
- **audioSettings**: Optional audio settings to use for audio output. Pass `nil` to receive the decoded samples in an uncompressed format. To determine the specific format, examine the value of the sample buffer’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/formatDescription] property.

For non-`nil` audio settings, the dictionary must contain values for the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/linear-pcm-format-settings] keys. The output doesn’t support the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSampleRateConverterAudioQualityKey] constant.
title: init(audioTracks:audioSettings:)
